option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
on: push: branches: [ main ] pull_request: branches: [ main ]
# Sets permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN to allow deployment to GitHub Pages permissions: contents: read pages: write id-token: write
# Allow only one concurrent deployment, skipping runs queued between the run in-progress and latest queued. # However, do NOT cancel in-progress runs as we want to allow these production deployments to complete. concurrency: group: "pages" cancel-in-progress: false
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest
steps: - name: Checkout uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: '18' cache: 'npm'
- name: Install dependencies run: npm install
- name: Build run: npm run build env: NODE_ENV: production
- name: Setup Pages uses: actions/configure-pages@v4
- name: Upload artifact uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3 with: path: './dist'
deploy: environment: name: github-pages url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }} runs-on: ubuntu-latest needs: build if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
steps: - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages id: deployment uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
on: push: branches: [ main ]
# Sets permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN to allow deployment to GitHub Pages permissions: contents: read pages: write id-token: write
jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest
steps: - name: Checkout uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: '18' cache: 'npm'
- name: Install dependencies run: npm install
- name: Build run: npm run build env: NODE_ENV: production
- name: Deploy to GitHub Pages uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' with: github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./dist force_orphan: true

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Modisane Investment Club

Home About Leadership Contact
079 671 8259
Home About Leadership Contact
079 671 8259

Building Wealth Through Property

Creating generational wealth through strategic property investments across South Africa and Sub-Saharan Africa.

4+

Years of Excellence

10+

Investment Opportunities

3

Key Markets

Our Mission

To build a property company that will serve as the cornerstone of wealth creation collectively for generations to come.

Our Vision

Modisane Investment Club (Property Division) strives to be a market leader in residential and commercial property across South African and Sub-Saharan African markets.

Our Markets

We focus on the residential and commercial property space, leveraging opportunities across South Africa and the broader Sub-Saharan African region.

Founded

12/05/2020

⚖️

Ethics

High ethical code and industry best practices

Learning

Continuous learning and development

Leadership

Good leadership and teamwork

Our Leadership

Meet the visionary leaders driving our mission of generational wealth creation through strategic property investments.

⚡

Mogale Modisane

Chief Executive Officer

Education: University of Pretoria
Field: Electrical Engineer
Specialization: Renewable Energy
ECSA Candidate SAIEE Member

Registered candidate of the Engineering Council of South Africa (ECSA) and member of the South African Institute of Electrical Engineers (SAIEE).

Matipa Modisane

Chief Operating Officer

Education: Monash University
Field: Software Developer
Specialization: Banking Fintech
BCIS Graduate

Corporate Software Developer in the banking fintech industry, contributing expertise for long-term company growth.

✈️

Kabelo Modisane

Chief Strategic Officer

Education: Westline Aviation
Field: Student Pilot
Specialization: Commercial Aviation
Commercial Pilot Training

Working towards commercial pilot's license while contributing to company development and growth.

Get In Touch

Ready to explore property investment opportunities? Contact us today.

Email

admin@modisane.com

Phone

079 671 8259
Home About Leadership Contact

© 2025 Modisane Investment Club (Property Division). All rights reserved.

option.name: updatedContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
Modisane Investment Club

Property Division

To build a property company that will serve as the cornerstone of wealth creation collectively for generations to come.

Company Overview

Modisane Investment Club (Property Division) is a property company focused on the residential and commercial property space in the South African and Sub-Saharan African markets. The company strives to be a market leader in the space of residential and commercial property, through the application of our main and core value systems such as good leadership, high ethical code, implementation of industry best practices and continuous learning and development.

Founded: 12/05/2020

Profile of Directors

Mogale Modisane (CEO)

Electrical Engineer (University of Pretoria). Practicing in renewable energy. ECSA candidate, SAIEE member.

Matipa Modisane (COO)

Corporate Software Developer in banking fintech. BCIS (Monash University). Focused on long-term company growth.

Kabelo Modisane (CSO)

Student pilot (Westline Aviation), working towards commercial pilot's license. Dedicated to company development.

Company Shareholding

The shares have been equally divided between the three directors of the company.

Contact Us

  • Email: admin@modisane.com
  • Website: www.modisane.com
  • Contact: 079 671 8259

© 2025 Modisane Investment Club (Property Division). All rights reserved.
